name: Everplast (itch)
description:
Everplast is a platforming game based on Fernand, trying to ruin the world for Ruth, ultimately overcoming the struggles and finding the real reason to the madness. Name of the game? Make it to the end, collect the gems, and show off to your friends your epic platforming skills, at least, without raging. Discover three hand-built worlds while roaming your way through the levels. You may take it slow, or speedrun it as fast as humanly possible, or spam powerups at the cost of all your coins. The choice is all yours. Oh - and try not to die too much, please?

Everplast is built with Godot Engine.
